about_the_game:
It contains Story 1 (1 of 4 in the full version) and takes about 10 minutes to play.

Characters

Lily

A new member of the occult club. She has a crush on Sally.

"Have you ever heard of Miss Choker?"

Sally

An ordinary college girl. She's the one who invited Lily to join the occult club.

"At a Gathering for Fatal Stories, once three ghost stories are told a real ghost will appear and make the fourth story happen..."

Azura

The president of the occult club. She initiated this gathering.

"The story I'm about to tell is one I heard from a friend..."

Miss Choker

A female ghost who targets young women.

"Which do you prefer, a blue choker or a red choker?"

Features

Horror stories that reveal the truth

One after another, the horror stories seem to relate to the trio more and more.

Story list:

  • 1. Miss Choker on Lilium Street

  • 2. Gathering Fo(u)r Fatal Stories

  • 3. Imaginary Friend

  • 4. ?????????????????????

Immersive camerawork in 2.5D

This game features 2.5D camerawork for more immersive storytelling.

Multiple endings

What destiny the trio will face depends on the choices you make.

Guidelines for Streams and Let's Plays

  • We are happy to have you stream our games or upload Let's Plays of them.

  • You may also monetize that gameplay, but only by using the features on online video platforms.

  • We would appreciate it if you would include the game name in the stream or Let's Play title, or put the Steam page link in the description.

  • We take no responsibility for any damage caused by your streams or Let's Plays.

  • These guidelines are subject to change without notice.

Note

This game uses character sprite materials from "わたおきば" [Wataokiba], which can be used for commercial purposes under their terms of use.

name: Blood Lily Ghoststories Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Storage: 307 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 or better Display
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A horror game about a needy female ghost. A trio of close-knit occult club girls gather late at night to enjoy telling ghost stories. Little do they know that Miss Choker, a ghost that targets girls, is just dying to appear...
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
